TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit ExceptionHandlingClause extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示結構化例外狀況處理 (Structured Exception Handling) 區塊中的子句。

span.span: Represents a clause in a structured exception-handling block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供資訊中的子句`try`...`catch`...`finally`The class provides information about the clauses in a `try`…`catch`…`finally` 區塊 (`Try`...`Catch`...`Finally`block (`Try`…`Catch`…`Finally` 在 Visual Basic 中)。in Visual Basic). 若要取得的方法中的例外狀況處理子句的清單，請取得表示的方法。To get a list of exception-handling clauses in a method, obtain a that represents the method. 使用 方法，以取得物件，並接著使用屬性來取得子句的清單。Use the method to obtain a object, and then use the property to get the list of clauses. > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意"和"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」 中，就可以找到資訊。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 屬性用來取得一份物件，並顯示其屬性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. 您可以使用 Ildasm.exe 來檢查 MSIL 已編譯程式碼範例中，若要查看的位移和長度的計算方式。You can use Ildasm.exe to examine the MSIL for the compiled code example, to see how the offsets and lengths are calculated. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的電腦語言可以產生子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，會略過其他語言的範例。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此程式碼是位於較大範例的一部分類別主題。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會由衍生類別叫用的建構期間物件。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CatchType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ CatchType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個子句所處理之例外狀況的類型。

span.span: Gets the type of exception handled by this clause.

value.span: 物件，表示這個子句所處理之例外狀況的類型，但如果 屬性是 或 ，則為 。

span.span: A object that represents that type of exception handled by this clause, or if the property is or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意"和"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」 中，就可以找到資訊。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 屬性用來取得一份物件，並顯示其屬性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的電腦語言可以產生子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，會略過其他語言的範例。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此程式碼是位於較大範例的一部分類別主題。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: 物件之目前狀態屬性的使用無效。

span.span: Invalid use of property for the object's current state.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FilterOffset As Integer
public: virtual property int FilterOffset { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得在使用者提供之篩選條件程式碼的方法主體中的位移，以位元組為單位。

span.span: Gets the offset within the method body, in bytes, of the user-supplied filter code.

value.span: 在使用者提供之篩選條件程式碼的方法主體中的位移，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The offset within the method body, in bytes, of the user-supplied filter code.

value.span: 如果 屬性含有 以外的值，則這個屬性值就沒有任何意義。

span.span: The value of this property has no meaning if the property has any value other than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 篩選子句包含使用者 suppliedMicrosoft intermediate language (MSIL，決定是否此子句所處理的例外)。A filter clause contains user-suppliedMicrosoft intermediate language (MSIL) that determines whether an exception is handled by this clause. 例如，任何包含 Visual Basic 的子句`When`關鍵字是子句。For example, any clause containing the Visual Basic `When` keyword is a clause. > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 MSIL 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意"和"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」 中，就可以找到資訊。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 無法取得位移，因為例外狀況處理子句不是篩選條件。

span.span: Cannot get the offset because the exception handling clause is not a filter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Flags As ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions

summary.span: 取得值，指出這個例外狀況處理子句是 finally 子句、型別篩選的子句或是使用者篩選的子句。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this exception-handling clause is a finally clause, a type-filtered clause, or a user-filtered clause.

value.span: 值，表示這個子句會執行哪種動作。

span.span: An value that indicates what kind of action this clause performs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property HandlerLength As Integer
public: virtual property int HandlerLength { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個例外狀況處理子句的主體長度，以位元組為單位。

span.span: Gets the length, in bytes, of the body of this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 整數，表示構成這個例外狀況處理子句主體之 MSIL 的長度，以位元組為單位。

span.span: An integer that represents the length, in bytes, of the MSIL that forms the body of this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意"和"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」 中，就可以找到資訊。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 屬性用來取得一份物件，並顯示其屬性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的電腦語言可以產生子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，會略過其他語言的範例。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此程式碼是位於較大範例的一部分類別主題。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 例外狀況處理子句的字串表示。

span.span: A string representation of the exception-handling clause.

returns.span: 字串，其針對篩選子句型別列出適當的屬性值。

span.span: A string that lists appropriate property values for the filter clause type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property TryLength As Integer
public: virtual property int TryLength { int get(); };

summary.span: 包含這個例外狀況處理子句之 try 區塊的總長度，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 包含這個例外狀況處理子句之 try 區塊的總長度，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整數，代表總長度，以位元組為單位，包含這個例外狀況處理子句之 try 區塊。An integer that represents the total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause. > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意"和"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」 中，就可以找到資訊。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 屬性用來取得一份物件，並顯示其屬性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的電腦語言可以產生子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，會略過其他語言的範例。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此程式碼是位於較大範例的一部分類別主題。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property TryOffset As Integer
public: virtual property int TryOffset { int get(); };

summary.span: 在包含這個例外狀況處理子句之 try 區塊的方法中的位移，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The offset within the method, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 整數，表示在包含這個例外狀況處理子句之 try 區塊的方法中的位移，以位元組為單位。

span.span: An integer that represents the offset within the method, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用例外狀況處理子句需要徹底了解的中繼資料和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令的格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition II:: 中繼資料定義和語意"和"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」 中，就可以找到資訊。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義名為測試方法`MethodBodyExample`，並顯示其本機變數的資訊和例外狀況處理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用來取得測試方法的物件。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 屬性用來取得一份物件，並顯示其屬性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的電腦語言可以產生子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 範例會顯示篩選子句中，使用 Visual Basic`When`運算式，會略過其他語言的範例。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此程式碼是位於較大範例的一部分類別主題。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]
